# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power generation facility at x=-9.5 to x=-2.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) - working, producing water
- Boiler (x=-6.5, y=0.0) - fueled with coal (7 remaining), producing steam
- Steam engine (x=-2.5, y=0.5) - working, connected to power network
- Pipe network (system 1919/1920) connecting all components

### Oil production facility at x=17.5 to x=37.5
Consists of:
- Pumpjack (x=17.5, y=40.5) - powered and working, producing crude oil
- Oil refinery (x=27.5, y=40.5) - powered, showing FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE despite crude oil input
- Storage tank (x=32.5, y=40.5) - empty
- Chemical plant (x=37.5, y=40.5) - powered, showing ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE (needs coal)
- Wooden chest with coal (x=37.5, y=37.5) - contains 140 coal
- Inserter (x=37.5, y=38.5) - powered but pickup/drop positions reversed
- Connected pipe network from pumpjack to refinery (system 1924)

## ERROR TIPS

### Power pole placement issues
- Repeated attempts to place poles while too far away (steps 32, 37)
  - Always move within 10 tiles before placing entities
  - Verify position is clear before placement attempts

### Fluid system configuration errors
- Refinery shows FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE despite connected pumpjack:
  - Verify refinery input connection points (x=28.5 y=43.5) are properly connected
  - Check pipe directionality and fluid flow direction
  - Ensure pumpjack output is reaching refinery input

### Chemical plant operation issues
- Chemical plant shows ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE for coal:
  - Inserter has reversed pickup/drop positions (currently moves coal from plant to chest)
  - Verify inserter direction and configuration
  - Ensure chemical plant input slots are accessible

### Connection attempts with empty sources
- Repeated attempts to connect empty storage tank to chemical plant (steps 34, 39)
  - Verify source has fluid before connection attempts
  - Check refinery output before connecting downstream components

### Inventory management
- Attempted to refuel boiler with empty coal inventory (step 36)
  - Monitor fuel levels and harvest coal proactively
  - Keep minimum coal reserve for power generation

### Previous errors still applicable:
- Power network verification (check all poles between facilities)
- Production monitoring (verify refinery output before connecting downstream)
- Entity inspection (check fluid contents before connection attempts)
